size_type  n = npos
) 
 

Construct from substring.

Parameters:
src - string to copy from.
pos - position in src to start copy from.
n - max length to copy. if n == npos (src.size() - pos) assumed.

size_type  n = npos
)

n - max length to copy. if n == npos, strlen(src) assumed.

Int compare (  size_type  pos,
size_type  n,
const Char *  str,
size_type  len = npos
)  const
 

Returns result of lexicographical comparison of substring with another string.

Parameters:
pos - starting position of substring.
n - length of substring.
str - string to compare.
len - length of str.
Returns:
negative if substring is lexicographically less than str, 0 if substring is equal to str, positive if substring is lexicographically greater than str.

Int compare (  const Char *  s  )  const
 

Returns result of lexicographical comparison with another string.

Parameters:
str - string to compare.
Returns:
negative if this string is lexicographically less than str, 0 if this string is equal to str, positive if this string is lexicographically greater than str.

size_type  n,

size_type  n1
)  const

Parameters:

n - length of substring.
str - string to compare.
pos1 - starting length of str.
n1 - length of str.
Returns:
negative if substring is lexicographically less than str substring, 0 if substring is equal to str substring, positive if substring is lexicographically greater than str substring.
